description: A quick, practical guide to Robot Abuse and What It Reveals.

hook.text: Boston Dynamics posted a video of people kicking their robot dog. The internet was furious. It's a machine.

twist.text: Research links animal abuse to later violence against humans. Could robot abuse follow the same pattern?
